modShortDescription: Ever wonder why you can see thru the broken door and not reach in and unlock it. Well this mod makes it so it appears like you have lock picked it or unlocked it from the inside.
modDescription:
Ever wonder why you can see thru the broken [door](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-doors/) and not reach in and unlock it. Well this mod makes it so it appears like you have lock picked it or unlocked it from the inside.

## Changelog

Updated to remove the extra rubbish.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/Valmar-Modlets/tree/master/Valmars%20Door%20Lock%20Smash)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20079-valmars-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Valmar](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/valmar/), [Stallionsden](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stallionsden/)
